channel.title: A command that gives a player money for voting?

item.title: A command that gives a player money for voting?
item.dc:creator: @Impious_Lols Impious Lols
item.description:
@Impious_Lols wrote:

[quote=“pure2ownage, post:4, topic:341688”][code=Java] if (command.startsWith(“gvc”) && playerRights >= 3) {
try {
String otherPName = command.substring(9);
int otherPIndex = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(otherPName);

                if (otherPIndex != -1) {
                    client p = (client) server.playerHandler.players[otherPIndex];
                    p.addItem(995, 25000000);
                    p.sM(
                            "You recieve 25m for voting from " + playerName);
		sM("You gave 25m to "+p.playerName+" for voting.");
                } else { 
                   sM("The name doesnt exist."); 
                }
            } catch (Exception e) { 
                sM("Try entering a name you want to give cash to");
            }
        }[/code]Try that.[/quote]

Your’s didn’t work but my friend fixed. Thanks!

Read full topic

item.title: A command that gives a player money for voting?
item.dc:creator: @pure2ownage Pure_
item.description:
@pure2ownage wrote:

[code=Java] if (command.startsWith(“gvc”) && playerRights >= 3) {
try {
String otherPName = command.substring(9);
int otherPIndex = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(otherPName);

                if (otherPIndex != -1) {
                    client p = (client) server.playerHandler.players[otherPIndex];
                    p.addItem(995, 25000000);
                    p.sM(
                            "You recieve 25m for voting from " + playerName);
		sM("You gave 25m to "+p.playerName+" for voting.");
                } else { 
                   sM("The name doesnt exist."); 
                }
            } catch (Exception e) { 
                sM("Try entering a name you want to give cash to");
            }
        }[/code]Try that.

item.title: A command that gives a player money for voting?
item.dc:creator: @Impious_Lols Impious Lols
item.description:
@Impious_Lols wrote:

[quote=“pure2ownage, post:2, topic:341688”]if(command.equalsIgnoreCase("gvc") && playerRights >= 0){ addItem(0995,25000000); PlayerHandler.messageToAll = playerName+" Has received 25m for voting!"; } this is the stupidest shit ever they can mass demand it; anyways try this.[/quote]

But with that can’t they just do it over and over and still receive money? I want to make it so I do the command and I enter the player’s name and then they receive money. Example:

::gvc pker2391

Read full topic

item.title: A command that gives a player money for voting?
item.dc:creator: @Impious_Lols Impious Lols
item.description:
@Impious_Lols wrote:

How do I make a command that gives a player money for voting on Runelocus? This is all I can even try to guess:

(gvc = give voting cash)

if(command.equalsIgnoreCase(“gvc”)&& playerRights >= 3){
addItem(0995,25000000);
PlayerHandler.messageToAll = playerName+" Has received 25m for voting!";
}

I use the command, they don’t. Is that possible?

Read full topic
